data.text:
Hi Forum Posters!

I really need to get my head around just HOW much content Xbox now owns and can use for revivals and game pass content. I will update formatting as time goes on but basically, let’s look at each game, who made it, and when its last entry was.

ACTIVISION IP

TITLE GENRE LAST RELEASE STUDIO Blur RACING 2010 BIZARRE CREATIONS Caesar RTS 2006 TILTED MILL ENT Call of Duty FPS 2021 TOO MANY Candy Crush MOBILE ONGOING KING Crash Bandicoot ACTION PLATFORMER 2020 TOYS FOR BOB Diablo ACTION RPG 2012 BLIZZARD DJ Hero RHYTHM 2010 FREESTYLE GAMES Empire Earth RTS 2007 STAINLESS STEEL Gabriel Knight P&C 1993 SIERRA Geometry Wars ARCADE 2016 BIZARRE CREATIONS Guitar Hero RHYTHM 2015 HARMONIX Gun WESTERN 2005 BEENOX / NEVERSOFT Hearthstone CARD 2014 BLIZZARD Heroes of the Storm MOBA 2015 BLIZZARD Hexen FPS 1997 RAVEN SOFTWARE Interstate ’76 RACING 1997 ACTIVISION King’s Quest P&C 1998 SIERRA Laura Bow Mysteries P&C 1990 SIERRA The Lost Vikings SIDE SCROLLER 1993 SILICON AND SYNAPSE Overwatch FPS 2016 BLIZZARD Phantasmagoria P&C 1995 SIERRA Pitfall PLATFORMER 2004 BEENOX Police Quest SIM 2008 SIERRA Prototype ACTION ADVENTURE 2012 RADICAL ENTERTAINMENT Quest for Glory P&C 1998 SIERRA Singularity FPS 2010 RAVEN SOFTWARE Skylanders PLATFORMER 2018 TOYS FOR BOB Soldier of Fortune FPS 2001 RAVEN SOFTWARE Space Quest P&C 1995 SIERRA? TITLE GENRE LAST RELEASE STUDIO Age of Empires RTS 2021 WORLDS EDGE Banjo Kazooie ACTION PLATFORMER 2008 RARE The Bards Tale DUNGEON CRAWLER 2019 INXILE ENT Battletoads BEAT EM UP / SIDE SCROLLER 2020 RARE / DLALA Conker PLATFORMER 2005 RARE Crackdown PLATFORMER / SHOOTER 2019 SUMO DIGITAL Crimson Skies ARCADE FLIGHT 2002 ZIPPER INTERACTIVE Fable WRPG 2011 LIONHEAD STUDIOS Forza Motorsport SIMULATION RACING 2017 TURN 10 STUDIOS Forza Horizon ARCADE RACING 2021 PLAYGROUND GAMES Gears of War THIRD PERSON SHOOTER 2020 THE COALITION Gears Tactics STRATEGY 2020 SPLASH DAMAGE Halo FPS 2021 343 INDUSTRIES Halo Wars RTS 2017 CREATIVE ASSEMBLY Killer Instinct FIGHTING 2013 DOUBLE HELIX / IRON GALAXY Links GOLF SIMULATION 2003 INDIE BUILT MS Flight Simulator FLIGHT SIMULATION 2020 ASOBO STUDIO Minecraft SANDBOX 2011 - PRES MOJANG Minecraft Dungeons ACTION RPG 2020 MOJANG NBA Inside Drive SPORTS 2003 HIGH VOLTAGE SOFTWARE NFL Fever SPORTS 2003 MICROSOFT GAME STUDIOS Perfect Dark FPS 2005 RARE Pillars of Eternity CRPG 2020 OBSIDIAN ENT Project Gotham Racing RACING 2007 BIZARRE CREATIONS Sabreman PUZZLES 1986 ULTIMATE PLAY THE GAME (PRE-RARE) Sea Of Theives ONLINE PUZZLE ADVENTURE 2021 RARE State of Decay ACTION SURVIVAL HORROR 2018 UNDEAD LABS Viva Pinata SIMULATION SANDBOX 2008 RARE Wasteland CRPG / STRATEGY 2020 INXILE ENT Zoo Tycoon BUSINESS SIMULATION 2013 ASOBO STUDIO

HELP ME OUT! if I’ve missed anything let me know and i can look it up and add to the tables as we go. what is your most wanted series revival?

thanks ill add that to the list

i found this on doublefines wiki and parsing through what i think they still owned plus your list i have

Rock N Roll Racing RC Pro Am Jet Force Gemini 1 vs 100 Kameo Jetpac Grabbed by the Ghoulies Psychonauts Costume Quest Brutal Legend Iron Brigade Grim Fandango Day of the Tentacle Full Throttle

Activision got metal arms glitch in the system

The commercial tried to throw shade at halo CE.

Activision got metal arms glitch in the system

The commercial tried to throw shade at halo CE.

I just want a port. No way to play it now.

In my opinion any Activision x Disney collaboration is available for a remake, remaster, or backwards compatible release. Stuff like Simpsons hit and run. Sure Activision doesn’t technically own the rights to Disney Fox Marvel but I assume Disney would approve most backwards compatibility titles these days. The one exemption being Activisions Spider-Man games. Disney will attempt to get along with Sony about those games. Not because any contractual agreement but more as a curtesy to Sony.

I’ve only played the first few hours, but I was actually kinda blown away by how much I was enjoying it. Got it for like $3 at GameStop forever ago.

I would definitely wait for it to come to Game Pass though. It’s usually way too high of a price on sale.

Neversoft made the original and of course they got absorbed into infinity ward in 2014 to make call of duty. For fucks sake.

But apparently Beenox helped too in some capacity seeing development credits on Google.

I don’t know fam, just find a fucking way to get it back, we still making excuses about Xbox not having the studios?

I get it, but it’s a market where only one IP forms the entire identity and appeal of westerns to the point where even western IP older than RDR like Desperados 3 were dubbed by journalists “RDR2 but top down” or some bullshit like that. Comparisons will happen regardless. There are several IP that already have that challenge under MS. A new Banjo will inevitably be compared to a modern Mario. A new Hexen will be compared to modern Doom. You can’t just not take risks just because of that. RDR2’s strength is in its characters and writing and the open world feeling very alive. The latter is something Rockstar does very well, but everything else they aren’t impenetrable in.

And of course it isn’t easy. But if easy is all that mattered, then just having them all continue supporting call of duty is the way to go.

But it isn’t.

From that list I really want to see a new Freelancer, Crimson Skies, Shadowrun (RPG) and Zoo Tycoon like it was in the 90s.

What? Yes they do lol, they literally have enough developers and teams to tackle almost any type or genre of western games now, even fighting. They just need to facilitate a structure where that can happen organically like it already does under some other publishers (Capcom, Blizzard, Riot)
